posts.content:
Achieved this week:   Revised the 2309 LCCA manuscript, responded to most of the comments, and sent Dr. Li the revised manuscript.
 Most of the comments are constructive. A major revision is conducted on the Abstract and Introduction The most important for academic writing is the logic flow:  Locate the gap: The big map, the gap exists when taking a closer look.  Support from convincing reports (WHO, World Bank, Government) What did others do? What are the pros and cons?   What’s done recently? How can it be further accomplished?  New Data? New method? New Tool? New material?   What’s the plan? What’s done? What are the results? What do the results suggest? What’s the contribution and limitation?   Don’t be lazy. It takes time and effort to do everything including research. The professionals easily know the level of the work and the writing. It’s a good habit to keep learning (especially reading) and summarizing the knowledge.    Finished Week 1 of the Deep Learning Course 2: Improving Deep Neural Networks: Hyperparameter Tuning, Regularization and Optimization
 Train / Dev / Test sets Basic Recipe for Machine Learning Initialization and Regulization Setting Up Optimization Problem Assignments on Initialization, Regularization, and Gradient Checking    Setted up personal websites using Hexo and Hugo on Github Pages:
 Academic website in Chinese and English (Hexo) A blog mainly in English (Hugo) Hugo has the advantage of quickly generating a website. This advantage will make further contributions in a later stage with lots of posts.    Participated in the thanksgiving party hosted by Dr. Li.
  To do: Thesis Proposal Chinese CV The remaing comments on 2309 Paper
posts.summary:
Achieved this week:   Revised the 2309 LCCA manuscript, responded to most of the comments, and sent Dr. Li the revised manuscript.
 Most of the comments are constructive. A major revision is conducted on the Abstract and Introduction The most important for academic writing is the logic flow:  Locate the gap: The big map, the gap exists when taking a closer look.  Support from convincing reports (WHO, World Bank, Government) What did others do?
posts.title: Weekly Summarize 2309 Paper Revise

posts.content: Thanksgiving Day, Special Love Dear Liu
posts.summary: Thanksgiving Day, Special Love Dear Liu
posts.title: Love My Leo

posts.content:
The pandemic caused so many difficulties, and I have been trapped from gathering for a long time. After receiving the vaccine shooting, we are now confident to gather with our friends.
It’s very kind of Dr. Li to invite us to his family for Thanksgiving. I prepared a traditional Chinese food called La Rou (Chinese bacon meat), and my roommate Guolong brought a dish called Simmered Pig Feet.
Except for us students, Dr. Yang, Dr. Liang, Dr. Zhang, Dr. Genqiao, and their family members also gathered together in Dr. Li’s house. They also brought delicious food with them. Some photos were listed:
After the delicious lunch, we chatted for a long time, talking about life, job, family, and so on. Then we played cards and had great fun using Bargaining Chip and White papers as money to play the"Zha Jin Hua" game. When we left, Dr. Li asked us to bring more food with us. Appreciate it!
I forgot to take photos of these happy moments. But considering my father’s health situation, I probably will leave the U.S to find jobs in China next year. So it would be my last Thanksgiving in OSU.
This will definitely be my most memorable thanksgiving. Thanks, my dear advisor. Thanks, all my friends!
posts.summary:
The pandemic caused so many difficulties, and I have been trapped from gathering for a long time. After receiving the vaccine shooting, we are now confident to gather with our friends.
It’s very kind of Dr. Li to invite us to his family for Thanksgiving. I prepared a traditional Chinese food called La Rou (Chinese bacon meat), and my roommate Guolong brought a dish called Simmered Pig Feet.
Except for us students, Dr.
posts.title: Best Thanksgiving Day
